| # Animal species names                           | #                                                                                                                                                                                            | “Species names” for animals. This is different for every animal in the game (except beavers who are all the same species). This is only displayed in the animal info popup, and is meant as a minor flavor thing and to drive the collectability aspect of the animals. These are about half-and-half real and made up species names, and note that the species names should never use real life locations (ie. for example “European Beaver” shouldn't be used so we use “Common Beaver” instead) | #                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
